page.title: 02FASHION 1.
page.content: Girls tend to stick to light colours all year round.In summer pastel colours are fashionable.T-shirts are just casual tops and look more at home with jeans which are made from 100% cotton.This winter ski pants were in fashion.They were also in fashion twenty years ago,so this shows fashion recycles The fashion now is flowery cotton clothes,baggy tops and tight skirts.A lot of fashion nowadays is influenced by music and various pop groups.Here are a few examples:trendies,mods,skinheads,punks ,teddy boys,heavy metal and rockers.Boys are much the same when it comes to fashion.Some boys even wear skirts,but the majority stick to trousers. By Angela Buxton and Samantha Naylor.
